subject: Soccer
Parades
Women and Girls
Women's World Cup (Soccer)
organizations: United States Women's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: The support this summer for the women’s national team strengthened the notion that soccer has become the sport by which Americans most passionately express their patriotism.
snippet: The support this summer for the women’s national team strengthened the notion that soccer has become the sport by which Americans most passionately express their patriotism.
